channel.title: RuneHub PvP 525
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2qdsmqw.jpg[/img]
[b]Deob: 525[/b]
[b][i]There is no need for flaming, so please hold back from that and instead give me some constructive criticism. Thank You.[/i][/b]
[size=8pt][b]The grieving and tortured souls of RuneHub are begging for you to join their planned world apocalypse. Oil lamps flicker on and off as the ghosts and demons move forward to take your soul and make you a slave... in the underworld.[/b][/size]
[b][size=13pt]Experience it like you've never experienced it before.[/size][/b]
[size=8pt][b]The server is based around the whole map, and you are expected to use it. Shops are placed around RuneHub, and most of the shopkeepers, well... let's just say they've been there since "The Beginning" [/b][/size]
[center]More to be written here[/center]
Note: I did my best on the intro :P, feel free to help me improve it :)

item.title: RuneHub PvP 525
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Deob: 525

There is no need for flaming, so please hold back from that and instead give me some constructive criticism. Thank You.

[size=8pt]The grieving and tortured souls of RuneHub are begging for you to join their planned world apocalypse. Oil lamps flicker on and off as the ghosts and demons move forward to take your soul and make you a slave… in the underworld.[/size]

[size=13pt]Experience it like you’ve never experienced it before.[/size]

[size=8pt]The server is based around the whole map, and you are expected to use it. Shops are placed around RuneHub, and most of the shopkeepers, well… let’s just say they’ve been there since “The Beginning” [/size]

[center]More to be written here[/center]

Note: I did my best on the intro :P, feel free to help me improve it

Read full topic
